meanings.definition: Feeling or showing strong sexual desire
meanings.sent1: She blushed when she saw him, feeling the horniest she had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't control his thoughts, feeling the horniest he had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The romance novel made her feel the horniest she had ever felt, even in public.
meanings.sent4: The sight of him in a suit made her the horniest she had ever been.
meanings.sent5: The perfume he wore made her feel the horniest she had ever felt, like a magnet pulling her in.

meanings.sent1: The majestic bull stood proudly, the horniest creature in the field.
meanings.sent2: The ancient statue depicted a horniest deity, symbolizing power and strength.
meanings.sent3: The unicorn was the horniest creature in the enchanted forest, admired by all.
meanings.sent4: The rhinoceros, with its horniest appearance, roamed the savannah with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The ram, with its horniest head, led the flock through the meadow with authority.

meanings.definition: Most extreme or intense in a particular quality or trait
meanings.sent1: The horniest storm of the season brought heavy rain and strong winds.
meanings.sent2: The horniest roller coaster in the amusement park provided an exhilarating experience.
meanings.sent3: The horniest competition of the year had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The horniest flavor of ice cream was a unique blend of sweet and spicy.
meanings.sent5: The horniest sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues, a sight to remember.
